doc:
Bobby Burns https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bobby_Burns 0 Robert Paul Burns (September 1, 1878 – January 16, 1966) was an American film actor and director. He appeared in 201 films between 1908 and 1952 as well as directing 13 films between 1915 and 1916. Burns was born in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania and died in Los Angeles, California. He played Pokes in the Pokes and Jabbs silent comedies of the mid 1910s, with Walter Stull as Jabbs and frequently featuring Babe (Oliver) Hardy. Later supporting Oliver Hardy again in his partnership with Stan Laurel at the Hal Roach Studios in several of their early short comedies and feature films. Robert_Paul_Burns ( September_1_,_1878 – January_16_,_1966 ) was an_American_film_actor_and_director . He appeared in 201_films between 1908_and_1952 as_well_as directing 13_films between 1915_and_1916 . Burns was_born in Philadelphia , Pennsylvania and died in Los_Angeles , California . He played Pokes in the_Pokes_and_Jabbs_silent_comedies of the_mid_1910s , with Walter_Stull as Jabbs and frequently_featuring Babe_(_Oliver_)_Hardy . Later supporting Oliver_Hardy again in his_partnership with Stan_Laurel at the_Hal_Roach_Studios in several of their_early_short_comedies and feature_films .
